front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks: Media Access Control (MAC) Security Amendment 1: Galois Counter Mode-Advanced Encryption Standard-256 (GCM-AES-256) Cipher Suite
front.abstract: This amendment specifies the GCM-AES-256 Cipher Suite as an option in addition to the existing mandatory to implement Default Cipher Suite, GCM-AES-128.
